mapper.insert: insert into member(member_id, member_password, member_name, member_age_range, member_gender, member_phone, admin_id) values (#{member_id},#{member_password},#{member_name},#{member_age_range},#{member_gender},#{member_phone},'admin')
mapper.select: select * from member where member_id = #{member_id} AND member_password = #{member_password}
